name: Connect With Your Friends Through Violence And Shame (Ellie Braccini)
name_original: Connect With Your Friends Through Violence And Shame (Ellie Braccini)
description:
Connect with your friends in this honest 2 player experience.

The rules are simple, one player controls the mouse and one player controls the keyboard. 

The player with the mouse has to drag and drop objects from their toolkit onto the screen and try to kill the other player.

The player with the keyboard uses traditional platformer controls to try to survive until the timer runs out.

The winner of each round gets to ask the other player either an embarrassing, deep, or boring question that the loser has to answer. After that, the players switch roles and it starts all over again.

This is my first ever game jam game and also my first ever game finished and released to the public. It's small but I'm still proud of it. :) I hope you enjoy and have a little fun.
